summary:
This mod adds a 1 handed (and shorter) version of Hrothmund's axe.
Requires Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a 1 handed (and shorter) version of  Hrothmund's axe.
[size=4][b][u]Requires Dragonborn DLC.[/u][/b][/size]

The axe can be smithed at any forge with 2 leather strips and 2 steel ingots.
Tempering requires 1 steel ingot.

If you have any retextures of the original axe, they will be applied to this weapon as well.

[b]Check my other mods[/b]
-"1-handed" series
